title: Size of Life
author: eatonphil
aiHeadline: Scientists finally figure out that bigger is better, except when it's not, in this groundbreaking study about the size of life.

title: Rust in the kernel is no longer experimental
author: rascul
aiHeadline: Rust in the kernel? Experimental? Please, it's been stable since 2023. Now it's just officially not experimental, because why not?

title: Valve: HDMI Forum Continues to Block HDMI 2.1 for Linux
author: OsrsNeedsf2P
aiHeadline: Because nothing says 'we love Linux' like blocking HDMI 2.1, the HDMI Forum continues to prove they're experts at making everyone else's life harder.

title: Israel used Palantir technologies in pager attack in Lebanon
author: cramsession
aiHeadline: Israel shows that even in war, you can't escape big data. Using Palantir, they've turned warfare into a spreadsheet battle.

title: In New York City, congestion pricing leads to marked drop in pollution
author: Brajeshwar
aiHeadline: Who would have thought? Charging people to drive in NYC actually works. Pollution drops, and everyone learns that money talks, even when it's about saving the planet.
